name: UNUserNotificationCenter
desc: The central object for managing notification-related activities for your app or app extension.

items.name: current
items.desc: Returns the shared user notification center object for your app or app extension.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The object that processes incoming notifications and notification-related actions.

items.name: supportsContentExtensions
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the current device supports notification content extensions.

items.name: setNotificationCategories
items.desc: Registers your app’s notification types and the custom actions that they support.

items.name: removeDeliveredNotifications
items.desc: Removes the specified notification requests from Notification Center.

items.name: removeAllDeliveredNotifications
items.desc: Removes all of the app’s delivered notifications from Notification Center.
